name: df-dir
body: |- wceq(cdir, cab(s0, wa(wa(wrel(cv(s0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))), wa(wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(cv(s0))), cuni(cuni(cv(s0)))), ccom(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))))
comment: Define the class of directed sets (the order relation itself is sometimes called a direction, and a directed set is a set equipped with a direction). (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.)
